content: can someone help me in soving the the issue #15197. In which section I can find it in codebase
@Ritik I would start by using your browser's inspector to find HTML class names that seem relevant here. Or CSS settings. And then you can use git grep to find those in the codebase.
hey can anyone help me in the issue #15197 . I cannot find from where it is coming.

@Ritik Like Steve Howell said, your best course of action in frontend related issues is to simply right click on the target element (here on CZO or in your dev env), and find the relevant class/id with Inspect Element. You can then use your editor's search all function (generally Ctrl + Shift + F) and find the relevant code.
In this case, searching for date_row should help.
Look for the relevant js code and I think you'll be able to figure out the problem here. :slight_smile:
